title: Quizzes
content:
Quizzes Quizzes Solutions Quiz 1 (PDF) Quiz 1 Solutions (PDF) Quiz 2 with solutions (PDF) Solutions included in Quiz 2 PDF Quiz 3 (PDF) Quiz 3 Solutions (PDF) Quiz Grading Quizzes will be graded on a 100-point scale, the weighted average of which will be converted to a class letter grade following this rubric:
85–100: A range 75–85: B range 65–75: C range 55–65: D range below 55: F
